channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greece to crack down on short-term rentals and levy port fees amid overtourism
item.description: The country will also expand its so-called “Golden Visa” program to investors who are willing to put at least $277,000 into local startups.

item.title: Yellen says U.S. economy remains solid, on path to 'soft landing' with no meaningful layoffs
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said in August that the U.S. economy might be ready for an interest rate cut.

item.title: The bond market just flashed a reliable recession signal. Don’t panic.
Janet Yellen still sees a soft landing despite latest disappointing jobs report
item.description: Monthly job gains are at about the level needed to absorb new entrants to the labor market, Yellen said.

item.title: CIA director saw ‘genuine risk’ of Russia using tactical nuclear weapons early in Ukraine war
item.description: CIA Director Williams Burns said the risk of escalation should not be taken lightly, but the U.S. should also not be intimidated by Russia.

item.title: This benchmark chip-stock index has a big, bearish pattern building in its chart
Donald Trump threatens 100% tariff on countries that turn away from the dollar
item.description: “You leave the dollar and you’re not doing business with the United States because we are going to put a 100% tariff on your goods."

item.title: ETFs are on pace to break record annual inflows, but this wild card could change it all
item.description: ETF inflows could rise as investors begin to search for other opportunities outside of money market funds.

item.title: Palantir, Dell to join S&P 500; American Airlines, Etsy slide out of index
U.S. believes Iran sent ballistic missiles to Russia for its war on Ukraine
item.description: "This partnership threatens European security and illustrates how Iran’s destabilizing influence reaches beyond the Middle East and around the world.”

item.title: Couple founded a luxury psilocybin retreat that's popular with CEOs: 'It creates better leaders'
item.description: CEOs and entrepreneurs are seeking out psilocybin experiences for professional development. Here's a leading luxury magic mushroom retreat for executi...

item.title: Nvidia shed $406 billion in market cap this week. What’s next for the stock?
Russia’s strategy to rely more China’s yuan is backfiring
item.description: "We cannot lend in yuan because we have nothing to cover our foreign currency positions with."

item.title: YouTube group The Try Guys has quickly found success in launching subscription model
item.description: The Try Guys have abandoned their reliance on Google's algorithms and advertiser revenue by launching a standalone streaming service called 2nd Try.

item.title: Treasury-market yield curve just did something it hadn’t done since mid-2022
